author: James Wythe
name: Colourful Lentil Soup
notes: You can try this recipe as is or with a cauliflower topping. If you don't want to have the cauliflower topping you can skip step 1

list.name: potatoes
list.notes: You can also use sweet potatoes

list.name: red split lentils
list.notes: You can also use other types of lentils. Some lentils take longer to cook (for example brown lentils)

notes: This step is optional, you can have the soup without the cauliflower

tasks.name: Pre heat the oven to 180 C
Chop the cauliflower into florets
Place the florets on a baking tray
Sprinkle olive oil along with the smoked paprika until lightly covered
Place in the oven for 45 minutes (make sure to turn half way)
Weigh 450 g of potatoes
notes: You will no longer need the scale

tasks.name: Peel and chop the potatoes into small cubes and place them in a large bowl
notes: You will no longer need the peeler

tasks.name: Thinly slice 3 - 4 carrots and place them in the same bowl
Thinly slice 2 celery stalcks and place them in the same bowl and set aside
Prepare 1.5 L stock according to the pack instructions and set aside
Peel and slice 1 onion and place it in a small bowl and set aside
Peel and crush 2 garlic cloves
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: Place a large plan over medium heat
Add 2 tbsps olive oil
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Add the crushed garlic
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Stir well
Fry the garlic for a couple of minutes
Once the garlic is sizzling add the onion
Cook for 2 minutes until the onion softens
Add the potatoes, carrots and celery
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Fry for for 5-10 minutes until the vegetables have softened
Add the stock
Add 1 cup of red split lentils
Bring to a boil
Once boiling place the lid on the pan
Reduce the heat to medium/low
Set aside to simmer for 20 minutes
Remove the soup from heat
In a bowl serve the soup
Add some cauliflower if using
Enjoy!

items.name: pot
items.notes: large enough to hold 250 g pasta

items.name: Tongs
items.notes: Optional. To transfer the pasta to the sauce

tasks.name: Place a pot of water on high heat and set aside to boil
Chop a handful of olives
Place a sauce pan over medium heat
Drizzle with 3 tbsps of olive oil
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Once the pan is hot, add 250 g of cherry tomatoes and mix well
notes: Keep the tomatoes whole as this speeds up the recipe

tasks.name: Add the chopped olives to the pan and mix
Now set the pan aside for the tomatoes and olives to fry for approximately 5 minutes
Meanwhile crush 4 large garlic cloves and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: In a pinch bowl, add 1 tsp of paprika
notes: You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Add 1/2 tsp of chilli flakes and set aside
notes: You can add more or less chilli flakes, depending on how spicy you want the sauce
You will no longer need the 1/2 tsp

tasks.name: Add the crushed garlic cloves to the pan
Add the spices
notes: You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Using a fork pinch and squash the tomatoes
Mix well and set aside to simmer over medium/low heat for approximately 10 minutes
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add 250 g pasta
Reduce the heat to medium/high
Boil for approximately ten minutes until the pasta is al dente
Remove the sauce from the heat
Add in a hanful of basil and stir until it wits
Remove the pasta from the heat
Bring the pasta pot close to the sauce pan
Using tongs directly place the pasta from the boiling water into the sauce
Mix the pasta with the sauce until the pasta is fully covered
Serve in a plate adding some fresh basil on top
Enjoy!

list.name: ripe bananas
list.notes: Ripe bananas will make the pancakes sweeter

list.name: flour
list.notes: I use gluten free self-raising flour

list.name: Oil
list.notes: For frying. I use coconut oil

items.name: 1/4 measuring cup
items.notes: I use this to pour the pancake mix

tasks.name: Peel 2 ripe bananas
Add the bananas to a large bowl
Mash the bananas using a fork
notes: You will no longer need the fork

tasks.name: To the mashed bananas add 1 tsp cinnamon
Add 1 tsp baking powder
notes: You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Add 100 g flour
Add 1 tbsp maple syrup
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Add 140 - 150 ml plant based milk
Whisk the ingredients until well combined
notes: You will no longer need the hand whisk
This step is optional
You can add anything that you like instead of chocolate. For example strawberries, blueberries etc

tasks.name: Chop 25 g of chocolate
Add the chocolate chunks to the batter and mix well
Place a frying pan over high heat
Once its hot, add approximately 1 tsp coconut oil and spread evenly
Reduce the heat to medium
Pour a small amount of pancake mix into the pan.
notes: I like to use a 1/4 size measuring cup to pour the pancake mix

tasks.name: Fry the pancake on either side for approximately 1.5 minutes until golden
Repeat the above step until all the pancake mix is finished

list.name: rice noodles
list.notes: You can also buy it precooked

list.name: tamari
list.notes: If you can't find tamari, and you are not gluten free you can use soy sauce instead

list.name: miso paste
list.notes: I use brown rice miso. If you can't find miso you can use a bit more tamari

tasks.name: Crush a handful of peanuts and set aside in a pinch bowl
Chop 1 broccoli head into small florets and place inside a bowl
Slice 1 bell pepper and place inside the same bowl
Place a pot of water on medium heat and set aside to boil
Add 1 tsp seasame oil in a small bowl
Add 3 tbsp maple syrup in the same bowl
Add 3 tbsp tamari in the same bowl
Add 1 heaped tsp miso paste in the same bowl
notes: If you are not using miso paste add a 1 tbsp tamari
You will no longer need the tsp

tasks.name: Then, using a hand whisk, mix well and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the hand whisk

tasks.name: Peel and slice 1 onion
Crush 1 large garlic clove
Slice and deseed half a red chilli
notes: You will no longer need the knife and chopping board

tasks.name: Place a frying pan over medium heat
Add 2 tbsps sesame oil
notes: You will no longer need the tbsp

tasks.name: Once the pan is hot add in the red onion, garlic and chilli
Fry for a couple minutes until softened
Now add the broccoli and bell pepper
Fry together for 5 minutes until softned
Add 150 g rice noodles to the boiling water
Reduce the heat to medium and set aside to boil for approximately 5 minutes
To the vegetables add a large handful of bean sprouts
Add the crushed peanuts
Squeeze a lime
Add the pad thai sauce and mix
Cook together for a couple minute
Drain the noodles and add them to the pan
Stir well until the noodles soak up all the sauce
Remove from the heat
Serve with extra bean sprouts, chilli and crushed peanuts
Enjoy

author: Robin Robertson
name: Chocolate Cherry Banana Soft Serve
notes: This recipe requires a blender
You will need to freeze a ripe banana cut into chunks for a few hours before you can make this soft serve

tasks.name: Peel the banana
Break into chunks
Freeze for several hours or overnight
Soak 2 dates in water for at least 30 minutes to soften
Drain the dates
In a blender or food processor, add the frozen banana chunks
Add the dates
Add 2 tbsps almond butter
Add 1 cup frozen cherries
Add 2 tbsps cocoa powder
Add 1/2 tsp vanilla extract
Add 1/4 cup unsweetened plant based milk
Blend until smooth, thick, and creamy
notes: Do not blend more than necessary as this would result in a thinner texture
If you are having trouble blending, you may need to let the frozen banana chunks to soften a bit

tasks.name: Serve in a bowl with a banana if using
Enjoy! :)

author: James Wythe
name: Vegan Mac and Cheese
notes: This recipe requires a blender
The final step requires baking

items.name: Baking Dish
items.notes: large enough to hold 200 g macaroni with the cheese sauce

tasks.name: Place a pot of water on high heat and set aside to boil
Place 50 g cashews into a bowl and cover with hot water for 5 minutes
Drain the cashews and add them to a blender cup
Add the 150 ml plant-based milk to the blender cup with the cashews
Add 3 tbsps nutritional yeast
Add 1 tsp dijon mustard
Add 1.5 tsp olive oil
Add a pinch of salt
Add a pinch of pepper
Blend until smooth and set aside
Pre-heat your oven to 200C
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add 200 g of macaroni
Boil for ten minutes
Drain the pasta and add to a baking dish
Pour over the cheese sauce and mix
Sprinkle the vegan grated cheese on top if using
Place the pasta in the oven for 20 min at 200 C
Serve the mac 'n' cheese in a plate
Sprinkle with some paprika and serve immediately
Enjoy :)

author: Robin Robertson
name: Cherry Berry Smoothie
notes: This recipe requires a blender

list.name: very ripe banana
list.notes: Make sure that the banana is very ripe or the smoothie will not be sweet

list.name: ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
list.notes: Flaxseeds improve regular bowel movements and can improve your digestive health. In addition they can help lower cholesterol and may play an important role in improving heart health. They also lower the risk of strokes

tasks.name: Cut 1 very ripe banana into chunks and add it to the blender
Add 1 cup (100 g) frozen blueberries
Add 0.5 cup (110 g) fresh or frozen pitted cherries
Add 1 tbsp ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
Add 1 tbsp almond butter (or peanut butter)
Add 1 cup (22.5 g) raw spinach leaves
Add 1.5 cup  (360 ml) water
Blend all the ingredients until thick and smooth for about 1 minute
notes: For thinner texture, add less ice (if using) or more water

tasks.name: Serve immediately
Enjoy!

items.name: pot
items.notes: big enough to hold 400g of macaroni

items.name: large sauce pan
items.notes: This needs to be approximately double the size of the pot used to boil the macaroni

items.name: pot
items.notes: big enough to hold 1L of plant based milk

items.name: ovenproof baking dish
items.notes: approximately 40 cm. For best results ensure it has enough depth

tasks.name: Add 50 g of white wine in a measuring jar and set aside
Open and set aside 400 g of canned tomatoes
Wash 2 zucchinis and set aside
Wash 1 red bell pepper and set aside
Wash 1 green bell pepper and set aside
Wash 2 eggplants and set aside
Cut 2 zucchinis into small cubes and place them in a large bowl
Cut 1 red bell pepper into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
Cut 1 green bell pepper into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
Finely chop 1 onion and set aside
Finely chop 1 garlic clove and set aside
Cut 2 eggplants into 1 cm cubes

images.alt: Chef cutting the top of the eggplant off
Chef placing the eggplant vertically, with the cut top facing upward, cutting the eggplant into columns
Chef stacking half the eggplant columns horizontally and cutting the eggplant in columns
Chef putting the eggplant together and cutting into little squares

tasks.name: Place a pot of water on high heat and set aside to boil
Place a sauce pan over high heat
Drizzle the sauce pan with approximately 4 - 6 tbsps of olive oil
Add the eggplants to the pan
Sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the onion and the garlic to the pan
Mix and sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the zucchinis and peppers to the pan
Mix and sauté for 4-5 minutes, until the vegetables are soft
In a pinch bowl add 1 tsp oregano
Add 1 tbsp thyme
Add 1 tsp chili flakes
Add 1 tbsp granulated sugar and set aside
Add the spices to the pan
Add 1 tbsp tomato paste to the pan
Add salt and pepper to taste
notes: Taste to make sure you added enough salt

tasks.name: Mix and sauté for 1-2 minutes
Deglaze the pan with the white wine
Add 1 400 g can of tomatoes to the pan
Simmer at medium-low heat for 10 minutes
In the pot with boiling water, add salt
Add 500 g macaroni
Boil for ten minutes
Drain the macaroni and transfer to the pan with the vegetables
Mix and set aside

images.alt: Add the pasta to the vegetables 1
Add the pasta to the vegetables 2

tasks.name: Add 80 g of olive oil in a measuring jar and set aside
Add 80 g of all-purpose flour in a small bowl and set aside
notes: You will no longer need the scale

tasks.name: Preheat the oven at 180 C set to fan
Place a small pot over medium heat
Add the 80 g of olive oil
Add the 80 g of flour
Using a hand whisk, mix well until all of the flour is absorbed

notes: This step requires you to be hands on and stirring

tasks.name: Add 1 L plant based milk in 7-8 batches, stirring constantly
notes: Wait for the bechamel to thicken before adding the next batch

tasks.name: As soon as it thickens and comes to boil (bubbles start forming), remove from the heat
Season with salt, pepper and nutmeg to taste
Pour approximately 100g of the bechamel into the pasta mixture
Add 1 tsp oregano
Add 1 tbsp mint
Mix well

images.alt: Add the bechamel to the pasta mixture 1
Add the bechamel to the pasta mixture 2

tasks.name: Grease 40 cm ovenproof baking dish with approximately 1 tbsp olive oil
Sprinkle with approximately 25 g of breadcrumbs, rotating the baking dish until the base is fully covered
Add the pasta mixture to the baking dish
Pour the remaining bechamel sauce in the baking dish and spread until its fully covered
Sprinkle the surface with approximately 25 g breadcrumbs until it is mostly covered
Sprinkle approximately 1 tbsp of olive oil
Sprinkle with some thyme
Sprinkle with some pepper
Bake for 25 - 30 minutes
Remove and let it cool for 10 minutes
Serve with some mint leaves and oregano
Enjoy! :)

author: Robin Robertson
name: Banana-Chocolate Smoothie
notes: This recipe requires a blender

list.name: very ripe banana
list.notes: Make sure that the banana is very ripe or the smoothie will not be sweet

list.name: ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
list.notes: Flaxseeds improve regular bowel movements and can improve your digestive health. In addition they can help lower cholesterol and may play an important role in improving heart health. They also lower the risk of strokes

list.name: sugar
list.notes: Optional. If the bananas you are using are not very ripe

tasks.name: Cut 1 very ripe banana into chunks and add it to the blender
Add 0.5 cup (35 g) frozen blueberries
Add 2 tbsps unsweetened cocoa powder
Add 1 tbsp ground flaxseeds (or linseeds)
Add 1 tsp vanilla extract
Add 1 tbsp almond butter (or peanut butter)
Add 1 cup (22.5 g) raw spinach leaves
Add 1 tbsp sugar
notes: Optional. If the bananas you are using are not very ripe

tasks.name: (Optional) Add 3 to 4 ice cubes
Add 1.5 cup (360 ml) water
Blend all the ingredients until thick and smooth for about 1 minute
notes: For thinner texture, add less ice (if using) or more water

tasks.name: Serve immediately
Enjoy!
Wash 1 eggplant, cut it into 1 cm cubes and place it in a large bowl
Wash 1 zucchini, cut it into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
Wash 1 bell pepper, cut it into small cubes and place it in the same bowl
You will no longer need the knife and cutting board
Slice an onion and set aside
Crush 2 large garlic cloves
Slice and deseed 2 red chillis
Place a large pot over high heat
Add 2 tbsp oil
Add the crushed garlic cloves
Add the chopped red chillies
Sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the onion
Add 1 tbsp ground coriander
Stir and sauté for 1-2 minutes
Add the vegetables
Stir and sauté for 4 minutes
Open and set aside 1 tin (400 g) of tomatoes
Measure 1 cup (200 ml) of water in measuring jar set aside
Add 100 g ground almonds in a small bowl and set aside
Squeeze 1 lime and set aside
Open 1 tin (400 g) of chickpeas, drain, rinse and place in a small bowl
Add the chopped tomatoes
Add the coconut milk
Add the chickpeas
Add the water
Add the ground almonds
Add the lime juice
Salt and pepper to taste. Make sure to add enough salt
Stir well
Cook on a medium/high heat for approximately 10 minutes until the chilli thickens

author: Robin Robertson
name: Cauliflower steaks with chermoula sauce
notes: This recipe requires a blender

tasks.name: Preheat the oven to 220 C
Chop the cauliflower into florets
Place the florets on a baking tray
Place in the oven for 30 minutes
notes: Turn half way through
Don't worry if it doesn't look smooth yet

tasks.name: Crush 3 garlic cloves and add them to a blender
Coarsely chop 3/4 cup (22 g) fresh parsley and add it to the blender
Coarsely chop 3/4 cups (38 g) fresh coriander and add it to the blender
Process until finely minced
Add 1/4 tsp ground tumeric
Add 1 tsp white miso paste to the blender
Add 1/2 tsp ground coriander
Add 1/2 tsp ground cumin
Add 1/2 tsp smoked paprika
Add 1/4 tsp ground ginger
Add 1/4 tsp cayenne pepper
Add 1 tbsp blended peeled lemon
Add 1/4 cup (60 ml) water
Process until the sauce is smooth and set aside
notes: Make sure you process it long enough for it to become smooth and runny

tasks.name: Remove the roasted cauliflower from the oven
Serve hot topped with the sauce
Coarsely chop 1 medium red onion and set aside
Cut 1 carrot into 2.5 cm pieces and set aside
Coarsely chop 2 celery stalks and set aside
Crush 3 garlic cloves and set aside
Place a large pan on medium heat
Add 250 ml of water
Add the onion, carrot, celery stalks and garlic cloves
Set aside to cook for 5 minutes
Meanwhile, coarsely chop 1/3 cup (10 g) fresh parsley
Add the mushrooms to the vegetables
Add the parsley
Add 1/2 tsp ground black pepper
Add 7 cups (1.6 L) water and stir
Bring to a boil
Once boiling reduce the heat to medium low
Set aside to simmer for 1.5 hours
Let it cool for a while and then transfer toa high-speed belnder
Blend until smooth
Return the blended broth back to the pan
Transfer approximately 1/3 cup (80 ml) of the broth  into a small cup
Add 2 tbsp white  miso paste
Stir well until the miso dissolves
Transfer the mixture back to the pan and stir
Add savory spice blend to staste
Let the broth cool to room temperature
Divide  the broth among containers with tight-sealing lids
Store in the refrigerator (for up to 5 days) or freezer (for up to 3 months)

author: Robin Robertson
name: Whole Roasted Cauliflower with Lemon Tahini Sauce
notes: This recipe requires a blender
This recipe requires baking

items.name: pot
items.notes: Large enough to fit a cauliflower head

items.name: shallow baking tray
items.notes: Make sure it has a bit of depth to hold some water

tasks.name: Place a pot of water on high heat and set aside to boil
notes: Make sure there is enough water to immerse the cauliflower

tasks.name: Crush 3 garlic cloves
In a food processor or blender, add the garlic
Add 2 tsp white miso paste
Add 1/2 cup (120 ml) water
Add 1 tbsp tahini
Add 1 1/2 tbsp blended peeled lemon
Add 2 tbsp nutritional yeast
Add 1/2 tsp salt-free whole-grain mustard
Add 1/2 tsp ground tumeric
Add savory spice blend to taste
Blend until smooth and set aside
Pre heat the oven to 200 C
Remove the stem and leaves from the cauliflower
Carefully place the cauliflower in the boiling water making sure its completely immersed
Lower the heat to medium
Place the lid on the pot
Cook for about 8 minutes until the cauliflower is blanched
Transfer the cauliflower to a shallow baking dish, with the stem side facing down
Add about 1 cm of the water from the pot to the baking dish
Pour about half of the sauce on the cauliflower and use your fingers to rub it until the cauliflower is fully covered
Roast for about 40 minutes, until the cauliflower is tender
Roughly chop 3 tbsp of chopped fresh parsley
Add the parsley to the remaining sauce
Add ground black pepper to taste
Stir well
notes: Adjust the seasonings if needed

tasks.name: Remove the cauliflower from the oven
If needed, heat the sauce in a small sauce pan or the microwave
Serve the cauliflower in a plate and top with more sauce
Enjoy! :)
Peel 2 ripe bananas
Add the bananas to a large bowl
Mash the bananas using a fork
notes: You will no longer need the fork

tasks.name: Add 1 1/2 cup of all-purpose flour
Add 1 cup of date sugar
Add 3/4 tsp bicarbonate soda
Add 1/2 tsp salt
Mix well and set aside
Add 1/2 cup unsweetened cocoa powder in a small bowl and set aside
Warm 1 cup of water and pour it in the bowl with the cocoa powder
Mix until dissolved
Pre heat the oven at 180 degrees,  (or 160 degrees if fan oven)
Make a hole in the middle of the flour mixture
Add the cocoa mixture
Add 1 tsp vanilla extract
Mix until homogeneous
Add 2 tsp white vinegar
Mix just until combined
Then immediately pour the mixture into the cake pan
Bake until inserting a knife in the cake center comes out clean
